oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Story In Song - Audition - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS/WBBM audition for radio program the American Story In Song, part 2. Featuring Bob Atcher, the Columbia String Band, 'The Quartet', Sally & Billie, and host Ted Grizzard. Though the disc is labeled as 'Art Satherley show', the program is introduced as the 'American Story In Song'. Circa 1946 based on another audition recording for this program (see TR001367 ).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Atcher; Sally & Billie; Columbia String Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ted Grizzard introduces Bob Atcher -- No Letter Today (Bob Atcher) -- Ted Grizzard introduces Sally & Billie -- You'll Be Sorry (Sally & Billie) -- Ted Grizzard introduces the next song -- There Is Sunshine In My Soul Today (cast) -- Ted Grizzard and Bob Atcher talk -- Have I Told You Lately That I Love You? (Bob Atcher) -- Ted Grizzard introduces the next song -- Shame On You (cast) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Ted Grizzard) -- Station announcements (Ted Grizzard)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; WBBM (Radio station : Chicago, Ill.); American story in song (Radio program); Atcher, Bob; Satherley, Art
